EncryptionManager.summary: Utility Class that provides base methods to get a private/public key pair, sign a message and verify a signature.

SignMsg.summary: Static method to get a Signature from an input string using the provided private key.
SignMsg.param: The key to use to encrypt.
SignMsg.returns: The array of byte representing the signature of the message.

VerifySignature.summary: Static method to verify a signature using a public key.
VerifySignature.param: The string to use to verify if the signature is valid.
The public key to use to verify the signature.
VerifySignature.returns: if the signature is valid, if not.

GenKey_SaveInContainer.summary: Static method used to obtain a private key from an RSA public/private key pair.
GenKey_SaveInContainer.returns: a private key from an RSA public/private key pair.

GetKeyFromContainer.summary: Static method used to obtain a public key from an RSA public/private key pair, obtained passing a private key.
GetKeyFromContainer.param: The private key to use to obtain the public key.
GetKeyFromContainer.returns: a public key from an RSA public/private key pair.
